item.title: Japan to Approve First JPY-Backed Stablecoin JPYC
item.description: On August 17th, as per Nikkei News, the Japan Financial Services Agency is set to approve the country's first issuance of a yen-denominated stablecoin named JPYC this month. The Japan Financial Services Agency will register the fintech company JPYC Inc. as a funds transfer business operator, and sales are anticipated to commence a few weeks after the registration. This digital currency will be underpinned by liquid assets like government bonds to keep its value stable at 1 JPYC equaling 1 yen.

item.title: Macro News Week Ahead: Fed Meeting Minutes, Latest Jobless Claims to Be Released on Thursday, Powell to Speak at Central Bank Symposium on Friday
item.description: August 17th, Beijing Time:Next Thursday at 2:00 AM, the Federal Reserve will make public the most recent minutes of its monetary policy meeting. At 3:00 AM, 2027 FOMC voter and the President of the Atlanta Fed, Bostic, will give a speech on the economic outlook.Next Thursday at 8:30 PM, the US Department of Labor will issue the initial jobless claims data for the week ending August 16th.Next Friday at 10:00 PM, the Fed Chair, Powell, will present a speech at the Jackson Hole Global Central Bankers Conference.

item.title: A whale address has withdrawn 721,000 LINK from Binance in the past 2 days, worth $17.44 million.
item.description: On August 17th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, Whale '0x4eb' withdrew 721,294 LINK from Binance within the past two days, with a value of $17.44 million.Moreover, Whale '0xa36' withdrew 169,615 LINK from Binance, amounting to $4.16 million. Over the past month, this whale has accumulated a total of 275,002 LINK, valued at $6.65 million.

item.title: A whale address bought 1.79 million FARTCOIN at an average price of $0.96.
item.description: On August 17th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale address withdrew 1.72 million USDC from Binance. Subsequently, it bought 1.79 million FARTCOIN on the blockchain with an average purchase price of $0.96.

item.title: A whale address withdrew 7866 ETH from Kraken again 2 hours ago
item.description: On August 17th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale address withdrew another 7866 ETH from Kraken 2 hours ago. The value of this withdrawal is approximately $34.99 million. Currently, this whale address holds a total of 16,872 ETH, with a value of $75.35 million.

item.title: Ethereum Surges, Briefly Breaks Above $4550
item.description: On August 17th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum witnessed a rebound and briefly surpassed $4550. It is currently trading at $4547, with a 24-hour increase of 2.28%.

item.title: 「The Big Bro」 placed a sell limit order for 1800 ETH in the $4550 to $4800 range to reduce risk
item.description: August 17th. According to on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), when ETH surged above $4500, "Big Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng placed a 1800 ETH limit order within the [4550~4800] range. His long position entry price was $4,635, suggesting that "Big Brother Ma Ji" simultaneously established safety values for both upward and downward movements in order to avoid excessive losses or excessive greed. Currently, only 100 ETH have been traded.His 25x leveraged ETH long position is currently experiencing a floating loss of $2.08 million, while his 40x leveraged BTC long position has a floating profit of $78,000, and the overall position is worth $110 million.

item.title: Binance Alpha will conduct an airdrop today at 20:00 UTC, with a claiming threshold of 200 points.
item.description: On August 17th, as per an official announcement, Binance Alpha is scheduled to conduct an airdrop at 20:00 (UTC) today. Users who hold at least 200 Binance Alpha points are eligible to claim the airdropped tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. This process will continue until the airdrop pool is exhausted or the event comes to an end. Additional details will be announced separately.

item.title: Public Blockchain Activity Top 7-Day Rankings: Solana Holds Firm at the Top
item.description: August 17th. Based on Nansen data, the top five blockchains in terms of the number of active addresses over the past 7 days are as follows: Solana (20.71 million), BNB Chain (10.26 million), Base (7.192 million), Tron (6.317 million), and Sei (5.069 million).

item.title: Securities and Futures CommissionIntermediaries Division Executive Director: Some companies have stated that they plan to apply for a stablecoin license, causing their stock prices to rise. Investo...
item.description: August 17th. According to the report in Ming Pao, Leung Chee-hing, the executive director of the Intermediaries Division of the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (SFC), stated that after the recent implementation of the "Stablecoin Regulation," some companies have claimed to have applied for a license or intended to do so, which has led to an increase in their stock prices. He pointed out that investors' responses have been very enthusiastic and urged investors to maintain a "line of reason." The SFC is concerned about the increased risk of fraud.Leung Chee-hing stated that in the first half of this year, there were 265 complaints related to virtual asset trading, mainly involving overseas investors investing abroad and reporting monetary losses. The reasons included falling victim to fraud, assets being stolen due to platform hacking, platforms refusing to acknowledge winnings, or the trading counterparty being accused of money laundering, resulting in sudden fund f
